custom-sql.sql: SELECT tbl_service.* FROM tbl_service WHERE (tbl_service.servicecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.servicename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM tbl_service WHERE (tbl_service.servicecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.servicename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT vrbt_service_package.* FROM vrbt_service_package WHERE (vrbt_service_package.servicepackagecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.servicepackagename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.serviceid LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM vrbt_service_package WHERE (vrbt_service_package.servicepackagecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.servicepackagename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.serviceid LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_service_package.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT vrbt_service_package.* FROM vrbt_service_package WHERE vrbt_service_package.serviceid = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM vrbt_user WHERE vrbt_user.serviceid = ? AND vrbt_user.servicestatus = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM vrbt_user WHERE vrbt_user.servicepackageid = ?
UPDATE vrbt_user SET vrbt_user.servicename = ? WHERE vrbt_user.serviceid = ?
UPDATE vrbt_user SET vrbt_user.servicepackagename = ? WHERE vrbt_user.servicepackageid = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM service_transaction_history
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM service_transaction_history WHERE service_transaction_history.transactioncode = ?
SELECT vrbt_category.* FROM vrbt_category WHERE (vrbt_category.categoryname LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_category.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM vrbt_category WHERE (vrbt_category.categoryname LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (vrbt_category.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT vrbt_video.* FROM vrbt_video, vrbt_cate_video, vrbt_category WHERE vrbt_video.videoid = vrbt_cate_video.videoid AND vrbt_cate_video.categoryid = vrbt_category.categoryid AND (vrbt_category.categoryid = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM vrbt_video, vrbt_cate_video, vrbt_category WHERE vrbt_video.videoid = vrbt_cate_video.videoid AND vrbt_cate_video.categoryid = vrbt_category.categoryid AND (vrbt_category.categoryid = ?)
SELECT * FROM vrbt_video_transaction_history WHERE userid = ? AND transactiondate > ? AND transactiondate < ?
